title: SOLD: Mixed Lot of T205 Cycle / T202 / Babe Ruth / Walter Johnson PSA/SGC
author: michael3322

posts.post_title: SOLD: Mixed Lot of T205 Cycle / T202 / Babe Ruth / Walter Johnson PSA/SGC
posts.post_content:
Sold. Thank you.


(5) T205s
J.T. Meyers, PSA 4.5 VG-EX+ (Hassan)
Freddy Parent, PSA 5(MK) EX (Piedmont)
Russell Blackburne, SGC 50 (4) VG/EX (CYCLE)
Harry Wolter, PSA 4 VG-EX (Hassan)
Clyde Milan, PSA 4 VG-EX (HONEST LONG CUT back) 

1929 Churchman's Sports & Games in Many Lands
#25 BABE RUTH
BVG 3.5 Very Good
+ the rest of the set in Ultra Pro soft-sleeves and hard toploaders

1913 Tom Barker Game
ED KONETCHY
SGC 96 MINT 9

1950-56 Callahan HOF
WALTER JOHNSON
SGC 86 NM+ 7.5

1940 Play Ball #119
OL PETE ALEXANDER
PSA 3 VG

T202 HASSAN TRIPLE FOLDER
TERRENCE TRUNER and JOSEPH BIRMINGHAM
The Scissors Slide
PSA 6 EX-MT

If you decide to split it up I may be interested in the Konetchy card.  Do you have an idea as to how much you would be looking for that one?  Thanks!

Chris

Thanks Chris. 

I would prefer to sell the cards as a lot. That said, please PM your best offer for the Konetchy card and we'll see if we can work something out.

Best,
Michael
